languages.text: Династии Винтерскейл и Чорда проявляют подозрительную активность на границах протектората. Как только подробности появятся в распоряжении слуг Лорд-капитана, станет возможным планирование ответных шагов.

traits.locale_text: Династии Винтерскейл и Чорда проявляют подозрительную активность на границах протектората. Как только подробности появятся в распоряжении слуг Лорд-капитана, станет возможным планирование ответных шагов.

languages.text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.
languages.original_text: Династии Винтерскейл и Чорда проявляют подозрительную активность на границах протектората. Как только подробности появятся в распоряжении слуг Лорд-капитана, станет возможным планирование ответных шагов.

traits.locale_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as Lord Captain's servants get additional details on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

languages.text: On signale une activité inhabituelle des maisons Winterscale et Chorda aux frontières du protectorat. Dès que les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine} auront obtenu davantage d'informations sur leurs déplacements et leurs intentions, il sera possible de planifier la suite des opérations.
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

traits.locale_text: On signale une activité inhabituelle des maisons Winterscale et Chorda aux frontières du protectorat. Dès que les serviteurs {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneur-capitaine} auront obtenu davantage d'informations sur leurs déplacements et leurs intentions, il sera possible de planifier la suite des opérations.

languages.text: 温特斯凯尔家族与库尔达家族在接壤区域表现出了不同寻常的活动迹象。行商浪人需要等待特工收集更多相关情报，才能采取接下来的措施。
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

traits.locale_text: 温特斯凯尔家族与库尔达家族在接壤区域表现出了不同寻常的活动迹象。行商浪人需要等待特工收集更多相关情报，才能采取接下来的措施。

languages.text: ウィンタースケール家とチョーダ家が保護領の境界で不穏な動きを見せている。ロード・キャプテンの従者がそれらの動きと目的に関する追加情報を入手すれば、直ちにさらなる対策を計画することができるだろう。
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

traits.locale_text: ウィンタースケール家とチョーダ家が保護領の境界で不穏な動きを見せている。ロード・キャプテンの従者がそれらの動きと目的に関する追加情報を入手すれば、直ちにさらなる対策を計画することができるだろう。

languages.text: An den Grenzen des Protektorats sind ungewöhnliche Aktivitäten von Haus Winterzunder und Haus Chorda zu beobachten. Sobald die Diener des Lord Captains weitere Informationen über die Bewegungen und Absichten der beiden Häuser beschafft haben, kann das weitere Vorgehen geplant werden.
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

traits.locale_text: An den Grenzen des Protektorats sind ungewöhnliche Aktivitäten von Haus Winterzunder und Haus Chorda zu beobachten. Sobald die Diener des Lord Captains weitere Informationen über die Bewegungen und Absichten der beiden Häuser beschafft haben, kann das weitere Vorgehen geplant werden.

languages.text: Las casas de Winterscale y Chorda muestran una actividad poco común en los límites del protectorado. En cuanto los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán obtengan más información sobre sus acciones e intenciones será posible planificar los siguientes pasos.
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.

traits.locale_text: Las casas de Winterscale y Chorda muestran una actividad poco común en los límites del protectorado. En cuanto los sirvientes de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán obtengan más información sobre sus acciones e intenciones será posible planificar los siguientes pasos.

languages.text: Winterscale ve Chorda Haneleri, protektoranın sınırlarında bazı sıra dışı faaliyetler gösteriyor. Lord Kaptan'ın hizmetkârları, onların hareketleri ve amaçları hakkında daha fazla bilgi edindiğinde gelecekteki adımları planlamak mümkün olacak.
languages.original_text: House Winterscale and House Chorda are displaying unusual activity at the borders of the protectorate. As soon as the Lord Captain's servants obtain additional information on their movements and intentions, it will be possible to plan further steps.
